title: AWO Scope Definition Schema
description: Schema for the AWO Scope Definition artifact (A-2). Defines the minimum machine-readable requirements for formal scope specification.

metadata.description: YAML-equivalent metadata extracted from the governing Markdown artifact.

in_scope.description: Explicitly enumerated items included within the scope boundary.

out_of_scope.description: Explicitly enumerated items excluded from the scope boundary.

boundary_rationale.description: Justification for the chosen scope boundaries.

producing_role.description: Declared role responsible for producing the scope definition artifact.

revision_of.description: Identifier of a prior scope artifact if this artifact is a revision.
